TextBody: Hello Robert, I will create a new ticket and send scheduling links. Below is a closing summary. I am glad that we were able to get your issue resolved. The following is a summary of the ticket for your records. Symptom When running the 2-Oracle_SensitiveDataScan job an error was encountered displaying the inability to create multiple AIC tables. Cause Investigated an error that was generated during the Oracle SDD Import process. The job that is affected is the 2-Oracle_SensitiveDataScan. Resolution We replaced the job with a fresh job and attempted to re-run the scan. This resulted in an error as well. We then identified that the AIC wasn't installed which is what caused the AIC table errors on the job.
